{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3537585,"name":"Ishaan Soni","username":"Ishaan_S","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/ba8739/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-24T00:14:11.411Z","cooked":"

Hello,

I am trying to focus on our team’s Limelight 3G, but we cannot set the stream rate to maximum. In the limelight documentation for focusing, it says to increase the stream quality to the maximum. However, this option doesn’t appear in the Limelight hardware manager even though the low and normal options are displayed. We have tried flashing the limelight to 2025.0, and we have tried this with a second limelight, but the option for maximum stream resolution does not seem to be displayed in the Limelight hardware manager. Any ideas on how to resolve this issue or what might be causing this issue? Any help is greatly appreciated.

Focusing | Limelight Documentation

Limelight 3G ships with an unglued lens to allow for lens swaps and manual focusing.
